main event: A possible cluster of balloons was observed in Houston, Texas on November 47, 1953.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 3 to 5 minutes., Objects were seen moving straight up and disappearing., The sighting occurred at approximately 9:15 PM., No photographs or physical evidence were collected., The conclusion drawn was that the sighting was likely due to balloons.
witness description: Lt. Hardy and Charles Street, along with others on the roof looking up.
